modules.description: Processes and transforms Pandoc documents by applying custom filtering logic. It operates on Pandoc's internal data structures, including blocks, inlines, and metadata. Used to modify document content during conversion, such as replacing specific elements or adjusting formatting rules.

The module offers functions for converting between JSON and internal representations of markdown documents, along with recursive manipulation of blocks, inlines, and metadata through mapping operations. It works with structured data types such as inline and block elements, tables, citations, and metadata, enabling precise control over document content and formatting. Specific use cases include building filters for document transformations, extracting structured data, and managing complex elements like tables and citations.
